Lorenz curve

Source: R/md_compute_lorenz.R
md_compute_lorenz.Rd

Compute the Lorenz curve for microdata.

md_compute_lorenz(welfare, weight, nbins = NULL)

Arguments

welfare

numeric: A vector of income or consumption values.
weight

numeric: A vector of weights.
nbins

numeric: number of points on the Lorenz curve.

Value

data.frame

Details

Given a vector of weights and welfare, this functions computes the Lorenz curve.

Examples

wbpip:::md_compute_lorenz(welfare = 1:2000, weight = rep(1, 2000))

#>     welfare lorenz_welfare lorenz_weight
